name: Beneath a Withering Moon
description:
Made for the Two-Minute Horror Game Jam

=--------------------======--------------------=

"Our world is lost. Strike one down and countless more come writhing through the interstice."

=--------------------======--------------------=

The land is beset by shadow. You have two minutes to cast the spell that will banish the darkness. 

Can you restore light to the world?

Or will you succumb to the dark?

ControlsInteractLeft Click/SpaceResetTabMenuEscape

Powered by the HPSX Render Pipeline
